quote: Why don't you tell your Uncle Quark    all about it?
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: What are you talking about, Quark?
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: You're fifteen minutes late for your    appointment in the holosuites, and    from the look of that drink, you've    been nursing it for a while.  You got    stood up, didn't you?
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: If you must know... I'm waiting for    Major Kira.  We were supposed to go    anti-grav sailing together... But    you know how she feels about the    holosuites.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: She thinks they're a complete waste    of time.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Anything worth doing in a holosuite    can be done better in the real world.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: You've obviously never been in the    right holosuite program.       If you'd like, I could...
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: You could.  But you'd live to regret    it.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Maybe some other time.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Sorry I'm late.  Sisko and I had to    revise the crew rotations again.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: You mean you're not canceling?
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: No... I'm kind of looking forward to    it.  Except for the crashing part.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Don't worry.  You won't crash.  We'll    start with an easy simulation...    like sailing across the Great Erg on    New Mecca.       You'll see... this'll be terrific.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Ops to Major Kira.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Kira here.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: You have an incoming communication    from the Bajoran Central Archives.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: I'm in the Replimat.  I'll take it    down here.       This'll only take a minute.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: This is Major Kira.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Major... My name is Alenis Grem.     I'm doing a study on the Elemspur    Detention Center for the Bajoran    Central Archives and I was hoping to    ask you a few questions.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: I'd be glad to help...       But why come to me?  I was never at    Elemspur.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Cardassian records clearly indicate    that a Kira Nerys was held at Elemspur    for...       Seven days.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Sorry, but you've got the wrong Kira    Nerys.  Believe me, if I'd been held    in a Cardassian prison, I'd remember.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: I don't understand.  I have the    records right here.  Kira Nerys of    Dahkur Province... Member of the    Shaakar Resistance Cell...
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: You see?
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: It's you.
scene: 1    INT. REPLIMAT

quote: If your memory and these prison    records don't agree, then one of    them must be wrong... Either the    records... or...
scene: 7    INT. SECURITY OFFICE (OPTICAL)

quote: My memory's fine.  I know exactly    where I was that week.
scene: 7    INT. SECURITY OFFICE (OPTICAL)

quote: After ten years?
scene: 7    INT. SECURITY OFFICE (OPTICAL)

quote: I spent that whole winter with my    Resistance group in the Dahkur Hills.
scene: 7    INT. SECURITY OFFICE (OPTICAL)

quote: We had no power cells for our phasers,    almost no food, and we spent most of    our time in caves hiding from    Cardassian sensor sweeps.  Believe    me, it was very... memorable.
scene: 7    INT. SECURITY OFFICE (OPTICAL)

quote: These records are fake.  The only    question is who faked them... and    why.
scene: 7    INT. SECURITY OFFICE (OPTICAL)

quote: According to this, you supposedly    shared a cell with three other    inmates.  Maybe one of them can help    us find out what's going on here...
scene: 7    INT. SECURITY OFFICE (OPTICAL)

quote: Elemspur... I haven't thought about    that place in a long time.
scene: 8    INT. OPS (OPTICAL)

quote: I was hoping you could answer some    questions about your fellow prisoners.
scene: 8    INT. OPS (OPTICAL)

quote: I'll try and...    (Yeln stops and stares     at Kira)   Wait... I remember you... You were    there, too, weren't you?       Kiri something?
scene: 8    INT. OPS (OPTICAL)

quote: Kira.  Kira Nerys.
scene: 8    INT. OPS (OPTICAL)

quote: I almost didn't recognize you.  You    used to wear your hair differently,    didn't you?  Longer?
scene: 8    INT. OPS (OPTICAL)

quote: You remember me... after all this    time?
scene: 8    INT. OPS (OPTICAL)

quote: When the Cardassians dragged you out    of our cell, I gave you up for dead.     Glad to see I was wrong.       Those were bad times.
scene: 8    INT. OPS (OPTICAL)

quote: Yes... they were.
scene: 8    INT. OPS (OPTICAL)

quote: He could've been lying.
scene: 9    INT. DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: Maybe.  But the records and the only    surviving witness both say I was at    Elemspur; my memory says something    different.       I have to find out the truth.
scene: 9    INT. DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: I understand.  If there's anything    you need...
scene: 9    INT. DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: I'll let you know.       This shouldn't take long.  I'll only    be on Bajor for a few days.
scene: 9    INT. DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: We'll try to manage without you until    you get back.
scene: 9    INT. DOCKING RING CORRIDOR

quote: There you are, Garak.  I came by    your shop, but it was closed.
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Business has been a bit slow... For    some reason, living under the constant    threat of Dominion attack has made    people less eager to invest in new    clothing.       How was your trip to Klaestron Four?
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Terrific.  The Klaestrons have    developed a burn treatment technology    that has to be seen to be believed.
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: You know... I envy you.
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: How so?
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: When I was young, traveling was    something of a hobby for me.  There    are few things in life that compare    with the thrill of immersing oneself    in the culture of an alien world,    meeting the inhabitants, earning    their trust.  But aside from our one    brief excursion to Bajor, I don't    think I've been off this station for    almost three years.
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: What's stopping you?  Ships leave    Deep Space Nine almost every day.
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Space is dangerous, doctor.  You    never know what might happen.
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Garak, you're being paranoid.
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Are you saying that the Cardassian    government would have you killed if    you left this station?
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: My dear doctor... you do have a vivid    imagination.       Now please... I want to hear all    about your trip to Klaestron Four.
scene: 13   INT. REPLIMAT

quote: Commander, we're receiving a    transmission from the Bajoran Central    Archives...
scene: 14   INT. OPS

quote: I'll take it.
scene: 14   INT. OPS

quote: If you're looking for Major Kira,    I'm afraid she isn't on the station    right now.  She's on Bajor.
scene: 14   INT. OPS

quote: I know.  That's why I called.  The    Major contacted me before she left.     She was supposed to meet with me so    I could show her the information I    retrieved from Elemspur.       She never came.
scene: 14   INT. OPS

quote: I tried to contact the Major to    reschedule... but she wasn't where    she said she'd be... As far as I can    tell no one's seen her since she    left the spaceport for Elemspur.
scene: 14   INT. OPS

quote: Wake her.
scene: 16   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Where... where am I?
scene: 16   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: It's all right.  You're safe.
scene: 16   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: What have you done to me?
scene: 16   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: We've brought you back home... to    Cardassia.
scene: 16   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Please... we're here to help you.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: I don't know who you are... or what    you're trying to do... but it's not    going to work.  Whatever you think--       This is going to get you, you can    forget it.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: We don't think it's going to "get    us" anything.  If all we wanted was    information, we'd have it by now.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Then what's stopping you?
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: We have no intention of hurting you.     Why should we?  You're one of us.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: This is absurd.  You can mutilate    me, change my appearance, but you're    never going to convince me I'm a    Cardassian.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: I know this is difficult for you.     And I'm sorry.  I wish there was a    better way to prepare you for what    you're going through.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Sometimes I question the wisdom of    our infiltration methods.  By altering    the memories of our long-term    operatives, we ensure that they'll    never be discovered.  But it makes    reintegrating them back into    Cardassian society much more    difficult.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Still, it's hard to argue with    success.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: You don't really expect me to believe    all this, do you?
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Of course not.  At least not yet.     We've given you medication to reverse    your memory loss, but it can take    some time to become effective.  Until    your original memories re-emerge, I    don't expect you to believe a word I    say.       But it's still not easy watching    someone you care about suffer.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Then I suppose you and I are old    friends.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: I supervised your training.       You're a field operative of the    Obsidian Order named Iliana Ghemor.     Ten years ago, you volunteered for    an undercover assignment on Bajor.     We kidnapped a Bajoran terrorist,    gave you her memories and appearance,    and placed you back on Bajor to    infiltrate the resistance.       I know you don't believe me, but    you'll remember. It will just take    some time.  Being here...    (indicates their     surroundings)   ... should help.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: This place?    (looks around     dismissively)   It's just another Cardassian prison.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: This is not a prison, Iliana.  It's    your room... in the house where you    were born.  You're home.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: My home is in the Dahkur Province of    Bajor.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Here.  This contains a personal    statement you recorded before you    were sent to Bajor.  Watch it.  It    should help explain things.       If you have any questions, just ask.
scene: 22   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: We interviewed all the residents in    the vicinity of the Elemspur Detention    Center.  One of them thinks he saw    Kira walking up the old Cardassian    Road toward the Center.
scene: 26   INT. WARDROOM

quote: When we scanned the area, we found a    residual electrostatic charge.
scene: 26   INT. WARDROOM

quote: This could be a transporter trace.    (more a statement     than a question)   You think she was beamed away?
scene: 26   INT. WARDROOM

quote: All right, I want the name of every    ship that was in the area at the    time of the beam out.       Constable, contact your friends in    the Bajoran militia.  Tell them we    need to see the activity logs of all    the ground based transporters in    that area.       That'll be all.
scene: 26   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Benjamin... those residual    electrostatic charges... they could    also have been left by a disrupter...    or a phaser set to kill.
scene: 26   INT. WARDROOM

quote: I know.
scene: 26   INT. WARDROOM

quote: Enter.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: There's someone here who wants to    see you.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: You took your time about it, Entek.     I don't appreciate being kept waiting    in my own house.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: As I explained, Legate, the initial    debriefings can be difficult.  We    couldn't allow any interruptions.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: It really is you.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: Remember, her memory hasn't returned    yet.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: I... understand.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: Iliana... I...    (Ghemor trails off,     at a loss for words)   I wish I could tell you how much    this means to me.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: Am I supposed to know you?
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: Iliana, this is Legate Tekeny Ghemor.     He's your father.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: My father?       My father died on Bajor... fighting    the Cardassians.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: That's not true.       I'm sorry.  I know you don't remember    me... but I've been waiting for this    for so long.       Please leave us.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: Are you sure that's wise?
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: She's my daughter.  She's not going    to hurt me.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: As you wish.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: I've missed you, Iliana...
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: Don't call me that.  It's not my    name... and I'm not your daughter.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: I'm sorry.  I didn't mean to...    (trying not to let     the pain show)   You're home now.  That's all that    matters.  I should let you rest.     You'll remember... in time.  Until    then... please, consider yourself a    guest in this house.
scene: 28   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY (OPTICAL)

quote: Good evening, Doctor.  When you're    all through here, I was wondering if    you might want to join me for a late    snack.
scene: OA   INT. INFIRMARY

quote: Actually, right now, all I want is a    little sleep.  Maybe tomorrow.
scene: OA   INT. INFIRMARY

quote: I'm afraid this won't wait until    tomorrow.  I have some important    news... about Major Kira.
scene: OA   INT. INFIRMARY

quote: In the left corner, above the window.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: What?
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: The Obsidian Order's surveillance    devices.  That is what you're looking    for, isn't it?
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Don't worry.  They're not on.  As a    member of the Central Command, they're    only activated at my request.       I thought you might want some    breakfast.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: (begins unloading the     tray)   I assumed you'd be used to Bajoran    food by now, so I took the liberty    of replicating some hasperat.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: I'm not hungry.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Recognize it?
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: It's wonderful.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: That's the bone-carving you made for    me when I was promoted to Legate.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Your daughter was very talented.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Yes.  She is.       I always thought you should've been    an artist.  You have such a wonderful    eye for detail.  But you were    determined to join the Order.  You    thought it was your duty to Cardassia.     Personally, I think Cardassia could    use a few more artists.    (trying to make a     connection)   You sure you won't have any hasperat?     It's only good when it's warm.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: No thank you.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Still stubborn as ever.  You're as    bad as your mother.  She could never    do anything the easy way.       You don't remember her either, do    you?
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: My mother was an icon painter from    Dahkur Province.  She died of    malnutrition in the Singha Refugee    Camp when I was three.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: I wish you would stop that.  Your    mother was an inquisitor at the    Central University.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: This is my fault.  I never should've    let you go on that mission.  I    could've prevented it.  A well placed    word here, a favor from a friend    there... you never would've known.     But you were so determined to go...    so proud that you'd been chosen,    that I didn't have the heart to stop    you.       Your mother never forgave me.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: You're good.  Really good.       The house... the food... the    stories... It's all very convincing.       But I don't believe a word of it.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Iliana... I just want you to know...    I'm sorry.
scene: 39   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Commander, I've already told the    good doctor everything I know.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: I'd like to hear it again,     firsthand.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: This is pointless.  Believe me,    there's nothing you can do.  If my    friend is correct, and Major Kira is    being held by the Obsidian Order,    retrieving her would be quite    impossible.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: Maybe impossible for us... but not    for you.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: I'm afraid you overestimate my    abilities.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: I hope not... Because I intend to    put those abilities to the test.       The three of us are going to    Cardassia.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: The three of us?  You can't be    serious.       Commander, if I were allowed on    Cardassia, do you really think I'd    be living here?
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: Which brings up an interesting point.       Garak, certain ministers in the    Bajoran government have expressed    concern about your presence on this    station.  In fact, they want you    removed.  Right now, I see no    alternative but to agree with their    request.    (going in for the     kill)   Unless of course, I can show them    that you might be valuable to them.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: Rescuing Kira would go a long way    toward improving your standing with    the Bajoran government.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: Why should I care what the Bajoran    government thinks of me?
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: I don't know... It seems to me that    if someone were in trouble with the    Cardassian Central Command, a Bajoran    space station under Federation control    might just be the safest place in    the galaxy.  Don't you agree?
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: This is extortion, Commander.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: Yes.  It is.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: We'll be travelling under false    transit documents prepared by    Starfleet Inteligence.  Mister    O'Brien's reconfigured the shield    harmonics of the Defiant so that, on    long-range sensors, it'll appear to    be a Kobheerian freighter.  We leave    in three hours.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: Fine.  I'll go along on your little    fool's errand.  But I want one thing    to be perfectly clear... I have no    intention of sacrificing my life to    save yours.  If it looks like we're    in danger of being captured... if    there are any signs of trouble at    all... you're on your own.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: Mister Garak, I believe that's the    first completely honest thing you've    ever said to me.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: How perceptive of you, Commander.
scene: 42   INT. SECURITY OFFICE

quote: She doesn't remember anything?
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Not yet.
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: That's unfortunate.  It would've    made things easier.       I'm afraid I'm going to have to ask    you some questions.
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: So soon?  I thought she would be    given time to regain her memory.
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: She was given time.  The desegranine    injections should've worked by now.     Memories usually begin to resurface    after only a few hours, and its    been two days.  She should be well    on her way to recovery.
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Maybe the medication wasn't properly    administered.
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: I'm not a doctor; I wouldn't know.     There may be something else we can    do, but right now, the Order needs    some information your daughter might    have.       So if you'll excuse us.
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: I'll be in the next room if you need    me.
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Legate, your concerns are baseless.     She's one of our own people.  We    have no reason to harm her.
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: And I'll be nearby to remind you of    that, in case you forget.
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: As you wish... Legate.
scene: 45   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: What were your duties as first officer    of Deep Space Nine?
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: I told you, I didn't do anything.     The Federation ran everything.  I    wasn't even allowed in Ops.
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: How many Starfleet personnel are on    the station?
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Oh thirty... maybe forty thousand.       But don't tell them I told you.
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: That's enough.
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Iliana, don't you understand what's    going on here?  I'm trying to give    you a chance.  Even if you don't    remember me, you're still one of my    operatives.  I don't want to hurt    you, but if you don't cooperate...
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Maybe there is a way to convince you    to take what I say seriously.       This is Entek.  Send me exhibit...       "S" one-nine-eight-three "I."     Immediately.
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: There's nothing you can show me that    will make any difference.
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Did you know that the Obsidian Order    saves everything that comes into its    possession?  You never know what    might come in handy.  We have    libraries of data transcripts, vaults    of ancient artifacts, even...
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: Ah... here it is.    (picking up where he     left off)   Even racks of cryogenic chambers    containing biological research    subjects like this one here.
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: It's not possible.
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: I assure you, when it comes to the    Obsidian Order, nothing is impossible.
scene: 46   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY

quote: It's a fake.  A clone... or a    hologram.  This whole place could be    a holodeck for all I know.
scene: 50   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY (CONTINUOUS)

quote: Remember the time you were on long-    range reconnaissance in the Bestri    Woods.  You thought you saw a    Cardassian soldier and opened fire    on him.  You hit your target, only    to find out...
scene: 50   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY (CONTINUOUS)

quote: (surprised, finishing     for him)   I killed a Hara Cat.
scene: 50   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY (CONTINUOUS)

quote: A mother Hara Cat, who was nursing    her young.
scene: 50   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY (CONTINUOUS)

quote: How did you know about that?  I never    told that story to anyone.
scene: 50   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY (CONTINUOUS)

quote: I know about it because we placed    that story in your memories, Iliana.     Just like we gave you every other    memory you have.  What we couldn't    extract from the real Kira, we got    from other prisoners... or just    invented ourselves.
scene: 50   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY (CONTINUOUS)

quote: Ask yourself two things, Iliana.     First, is there anything that I've    said we've done that's beyond the    capabilities of the Obsidian Order?     I assume you know there isn't.       And second... if you're not my    operative... if you're not who I say    you are... why would I play this    game?  Believe me, if I wanted to    extract the information from you,    I'd have it already.
scene: 50   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY (CONTINUOUS)

quote: But I don't want to do that.  I care    about you.  You were one of my best    students.  Watch the recording.     Think about what I've said.  Because    the Order won't wait much longer.
scene: 50   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - DAY (CONTINUOUS)

quote: I see you haven't forgotten all of    your Obsidian Order training.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Actually, I learned that in the    Resistance.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Next time you might want to keep a    contact wire running between the    wall and the access plate.  You    tripped a silent alarm when you    separated them.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: I'll keep that in mind.       I suppose if I walk out of here,    you'll try to stop me.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: I don't have to.  You wouldn't get    half a kilometer without being    detected by the Obsidian Order.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Maybe I'm willing to take that chance.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Iliana...
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Stop calling me that.  I'm not your    daughter... and I never was.  I'm    leaving.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: You'll never get off Cardassia.  In    the end, you'll just make things    worse for yourself.  I can only do    so much to help you.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: If you want to help me, get me off    this planet.  I'll never cooperate    with the Order.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: And eventually, they're going to    realize that.  Then they'll have to    interrogate me.  And I won't survive.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: I promise you that won't happen.       I'll never allow the Order to harm    you.  No matter what you decide, I    won't let them hurt you.  I only ask    one thing.  Before you make your    decision, I beg you, watch the    recordings Entek gave you.  It's the    only way you'll ever know the truth.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Begin playback.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: Hello, Iliana.  Welcome home.       I've been asked to make these    recordings for myself, for you, to    help my memory recover when I get    back.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: I go in for my surgery tomorrow.     I'm going to miss Cardassia.  But I    know I'm doing the right thing.  The    terrorism on Bajor has to be stopped.       Father doesn't want me to go.  Mother    just looks unhappy all the time.  I    hope they'll understand some day.  I    want them to be proud of me.
scene: 52   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

quote: How're the modifications to the shield    harmonics holding up.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: So far so good.  Nobody here but us    Kobheerians.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: We're well into Cardassian space, so    keep a close eye on that shield    modulator.  If it breaks down, we    could be in for some unwelcome    company.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: Commander, I just caught Garak    snooping around the access corridor    outside the main phaser banks.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: I was merely taking a stroll to    stretch my legs.  The quarters on    this vessel are rather...    claustrophobic.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: Confine him to his cabin for the    rest of the trip, and post a guard    at the door.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: Commander, I must protest.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: Protest all you like, I...
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: Benjamin, I'm detecting two Galor    class warships headed this way.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: What about the shield harmonics?
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: Still holding.  As far as their    scanners are concerned, we should    still look like a Kobheerian    freighter.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: Probably just a routine security    check.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: They're hailing us.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: Drop out of warp.  I don't want to    get too close to them.       Is the communications holo-filter    ready?
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: I can make your com image look like    a three thousand ton screech rhino    if you want me to.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: A Kobheerian Captain will do nicely,    Lieutenant.       Engage the overlay.  Put them on    screen.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: This is Gul Benil of the Eighth Order.     Identify yourself.
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: This is...
scene: 59   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE

quote: ... the Kobheerian freighter Rak-   Miunis...
scene: 62   INT. CARDASSIAN SHIP - CLOSE ON A MONITOR (OPTICAL)
location: CARDASSIAN SHIP - CLOSE ON A MONITOR

quote: I'm Captain Viterian.  How can I    help you?
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: What's your destination?
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Cardassia Prime.  We're carrying a    shipment of Kobheerian toranium    intended for military use.
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Prepare to be boarded.
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: They're moving toward us.  If they    get much closer, they might be able    to identify us.
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Gul Benil, our toranium is urgently    needed on Cardassia.  I would hate    for you to have to explain why it    was delayed.
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: The toranium can wait.  Maquis    activity in this sector is on the    rise.  By order of the Central    Command, all incoming ships are to    be stopped and searched.
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Drop the holo-filter.       Do it.  I can get us out of this...    if you let me talk to them.
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Please stand by.       Are we within their weapons range    yet?
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: No.
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Do as he says.  But be ready to get    us out of here fast if this doesn't    work.
scene: 63   INT. THE DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: (on monitor, with     authority)   Gul Benil.
scene: 64   INT. CARDASSIAN SHIP - CLOSE ON A MONITOR (OPTICAL)
location: CARDASSIAN SHIP - CLOSE ON A MONITOR

quote: You... you're not Kobheerians.
scene: 65   INT. DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Very observant of you.  Now turn    your ships around.
scene: 65   INT. DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Excuse me?
scene: 65   INT. DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: This is an Alpha Red priority mission,    clearance verification Nine Two One    Eight Black.  By the authority of    the Central Command, you are ordered    to turn your ships around.  Erase    all record of this encounter from    your logs and speak of it to no one.     Is that clear?
scene: 65   INT. DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Clearance code verified.
scene: 65   INT. DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: My apologies... I had no idea.
scene: 65   INT. DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: You were doing your duty.  End    transmission.
scene: 65   INT. DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Mister Garak, I'm impressed.
scene: 65   INT. DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Just something I overheard while    hemming someone's pants.  I suggest    we get away from here as soon as    possible.  In case Gul Benil decides    to show some initiative.
scene: 65   INT. DEFIANT - BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: All right.  One more time, Iliana.     What are the names of the Starfleet    ships deployed along the Demilitarized    Zone?
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: I don't know.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: That's not acceptable.  As a Bajoran    liason officer, it's your duty to    help coordinate Federation activity    near Bajoran space.       Now, what are the names of the ships    deployed along the Demilitarized    Zone?
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY
67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: Their names, Iliana.  Give me their    names.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: I think you've asked enough questions    for today.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: Legate... You can't come in here.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: Do you presume to tell a member of    the Central Command where he may and    may not go... in his own home?
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: This is Obsidian Order business.     Our autonomy--
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: Is a privilege granted by the Central    Command and is revokable at any time.     Don't you agree?
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: Of course, Legate.       Iliana, I'm afraid the next time we    talk, it will have to be at the    Order's facilities.  Good day.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: Are you all right?
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: Iliana?
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: No.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: No.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: Iliana!
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: No.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: It's all right... everything will be    all right.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: I am a selfish old man.       I can't keep you here any longer, no    matter how much I want to.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: Entek will never rest until he's    broken you.  If he takes you to Order    Headquarter's...    (trails off, shakes     his head)   We have to get you away from    Cardassia.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: You would do that... for me?  But    why?
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: You're my daughter, Iliana.  There's    nothing I wouldn't do for you.  Even    if it means losing you again.
scene: 67   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - ILIANA'S BEDROOM - DAY

quote: Iliana?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Here.  For you.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: It's beautiful.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: It was your mother's.  I want you to    have it... to remember her by.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I can't take this.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: There's no use arguing.  I can be    just as stubborn as you.       It runs in the family.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Legate?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Iliana... this is Ari.  He's... a    friend.  He'll help you get off    Cardassia.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Without the Order's knowledge?       How's that possible?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I have friends who can arrange    things... friends who think the same    way I do.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: The Obsidian Order and the Central    Command have been given too much    power over our lives.  We're going    to change that.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: You're a dissident?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Your father is a great man.  He has    everything any Cardassian could want,    but he's willing to risk his life    for what he believes.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: People like Ari are the real heroes.     My position protects me.  The risk    is theirs.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Legate... I have to get your daughter    to our next contact.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Goodbye, Iliana.  I love you.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Legate, I...
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: We have to go now.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Wait... this is wrong.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Please, Ari's right.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: No, don't you see?  The fact that    you're a dissident, that you're    willing to help me... it can't be a    coincidence.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Iliana... You have to trust me.     We're trying to help you...
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: It's Entek I don't trust.       Why did he go to so much trouble...    changing me into a Cardassian, sending    me to you?  Unless...       It's not me he was after.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: What are you talking about?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: What if the Order suspects your    involvement with the dissidents?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Impossible.  I'm too well protected.     They couldn't have any evidence of    my activities.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: But they could still suspect you.     And without any evidence, they    wouldn't dare interrogate you, would    they?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: The Central Command would never allow    it.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Which is why they had to make you    betray yourself.  And why they    kidnapped me.  Because I resemble    your daughter.  And because they    knew you would never stand by and    let me be tortured.  They wanted you    to do this... They wanted you to try    and rescue me.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Very astute, Major.  You couldn't    have done any better if you were one    of us.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: This is Ghemor.  Three to beam-out.     Now.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: It won't work.  We've got a    transporter suppression field     over this whole area.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: No.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Let's not have any more foolishness.       You don't know how long I've waited    for this day... Imagine, in one bold    stroke, the Obsidian Order will unmask    a traitor in the Central Command and    shatter the entire dissident movement.     And we have you to thank for it.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: The movement will survive without    me.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: You underestimate your importance,    Legate.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: With your help, we'll be able to    purge the government of all    disloyalty.  The enemies of Cardassia    will be destroyed.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: The enemies of the Order, you mean.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: The Obsidian Order is Cardassia.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: What are you doing?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I think you know.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Major, your testimony would make for    a more dramatic trial, but I'd be    willing to dispense with it if you    give us any trouble.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: The Major's the least of your    problems, Entek.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I suggest you lower your weapons.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I'll take that, thank you.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Garak.  What are you doing here?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I got homesick.       I think we'd better be going.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: It's okay... He's on our side.       I think.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Major, I must say, I don't believe    I've ever seen you looking so...    ravishing.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Are you all right?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: I'm fine.  How...
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Suffice it to say, I still have    friends on Cardassia.       I'm sure you'll derive years of    enjoyment trying to determine exactly    who they are.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Legate, we've got a ship waiting...    From the sound of things, I think    you'd better come with us.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Yes, I think that might be wise.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Garak, I don't understand.  Why are    you helping these people?
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Ghemor is a traitor... an enemy of    the Order.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Treason, like beauty, is in the eye    of the beholder.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: You're making a serious mistake.  Up    until now, the Order was satisfied    to let you live in exile, but now...
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: Garak, let's go.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: You know, I'd almost forgotten what    a pleasure it was to be with my fellow    Cardassians.  But as much as I'd    like to stay and listen to you    bluster... I simply don't have the    time.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: What a shame.  I rather liked him.
scene: 74   INT. GHEMOR'S HOME - MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

quote: So it was all a lie?
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: According to Doctor Bashir, my genetic    structure is entirely Bajoran.  The    alterations were surgical.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: What about the man who said he was    with you at Elemspur?
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: Gone.  Completely disappeared.  We    suspect he was a Cardassian agent.     He's probably the one who altered    the detention center records in the    first place.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: I thought you'd be happy.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: I am.  It's just... I still don't    understand.  If Iliana really was    transformed into a Bajoran, then why    did Entek have me kidnapped?  Why    not bring Iliana back instead?
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: Because the desegranine would've    worked on Iliana.  Her memories    would've returned and she would've    cooperated with Entek.  But they    knew you'd resist.  And that I'd be    forced to try to get you off of    Cardassia.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: You think Iliana's still alive?
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: I have to.  I'm her father.  For all    I know, she's still on Bajor.  And    someday, I'll find her.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: You sure you don't want to stay on    the station?
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: There's no place for me here.  The    Mathenite government has offered me    political sanctuary.  I'll be safe    there.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: One more thing, before I leave...    Can I give you some fatherly advice,    for old times sake?
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: Of course.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: This Garak fellow who helped you...    helped us... Don't trust him, Nerys.     Ever.  He's a dangerous man and he'd    betray you and all your friends in    an instant if he thought it would    help him.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: I'll keep an eye on him.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: I suppose it's time to go.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: Here.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: It doesn't belong to me.  I can't    keep it.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: No.  I want you to have it.    (still gently holding     her hand)   You may not be my daughter, but until    I find Iliana, you're the closest    thing I have to family.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING

quote: I want you to know... that... despite    what I might have said before... I    realize now that you're an honorable    man.  And I think your daughter    must've loved you very much.
scene: 82   INT. DOCKING RING
